name: Iron Defender
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can\'t speak
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Keen Senses: The defender has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.
traits.Telepathic Bond: While the defender is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Strength saving throw or take an extra 3 (1d6) piercing damage and be grappled (escape DC 13+1d4 + 11). The defender can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.
